item.title: ~THROWBACK THURSDAY~ THE CHURCH IS AT WAR: Antichrist and His Ruin ft. Jacob Reaume [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ August 24, 2023
On this throwback episode, Andrew and Matty highlight the spiritual warfare behind the cultural battles in our nation through past interviews with Pastor Jacob Reaume and Jeremy Bundy concerning their documentary Antichrist and His Ruin.

Episode Resources: Antichrist and His Ruin: https://antichristdocumentary.com/;

item.title: THE ESSENTIAL CHURCH ft. Pastors James Coates & Tim Stephens, & Filmmaker Shannon Halliday [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ August 22, 2023
On this episode, Andrew is joined by writer and director of the NEW The Essential Church documentary, Shannon Halliday, and pastors James Coates and Tim Stephens to discuss the documentary and its theme, namely, the proper relationship between Church and State.

Episode Resources: The Essential Church Documentary: https://essentialchurchmovie.com/;

item.title: COVID ALWAYS & THE NEWS PURGE BEGINS! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ August 15, 2023
On this episode, Andrew and Matty discuss recent Canadian news, from continued COVID fear-mongering and Big-Tech censorship, in the wake of Bill C-18, to Woke Commissars fining those who will not fly their Neo-Marxist flag. ENJOY!

[Segment 1] - The Regime WON'T LET COVID DIE!:
"COVID Vaccine New Variant: Eris" | The Independent: https://www.independent.co.uk/news/health/covid-vaccine-new-variant-eris-b2393511.html;
"Clip: Moderna Admits Not Knowing Where mRNA Went in Body or Amount of mRNA in Each Batch - Dr. Byram Bridle" | Bright Light News: https://brightlightnews.com/clip-moderna-admits-not-knowing-where-mrna-went-in-body-or-amount-of-mrna-in-each-batch-dr-byram-bridle;

[Segment 2] - Other things going on in Canada:
"Meta News C18" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/08/01/meta-news-c18;
"Decision Day for CK Councillor Accused of Breaching Code of Conduct" | CK News Today: https://cknewstoday.ca/chatham/news/2023/08/14/decision-day-for-ck-councillor-accused-of-breaching-code-of-conduct;
"Alberta Town Creates Bizarre New Pro-Life Imagery Bylaw" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/alberta_town_creates_bizarre_new_pro_life_imagery_bylaw;

[Segment 3] -  Mailbag:
Send your comments, questions, and concerns to: mailbag@libertycoalitioncanada.com;

item.title: The Great Canadian (In)Justice System ft. JCCF President, John Carpay [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ August 15, 2023
On this episode, Andrew and Matty discuss Canada's partial, corrupt, and widely Left-Wing judicial system. John Carpay, President of the JCCF, joins them to talk about the recent Supreme Court of Canada decision not to hear Churches' constitutional challenge concerning COVID restrictions. Tune in and enjoy!

[Segment 1] -  INTERVIEW ft. John Carpay:
Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedom: https://www.jccf.ca/;
"Supreme Court Will Not Hear Ontario Churches' Constitutional Challenge to COVID Restrictions" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms: https://www.jccf.ca/supreme-court-will-not-hear-ontario-churches-constitutional-challenge-to-covid-restrictions/;

[Segment 2] - Liberal-appointed judges donate to Liberals:
"Exclusive Data Analysis Reveals Liberals Appoint Judges Who Are Party Donors" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/feature/exclusive-data-analysis-reveals-liberals-appoint-judges-who-are-party-donors;
"Outrage: Trudeau Appointment Judges" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/08/11/outrage-trudeau-appointment-judges;

[Segment 3] -  Domestic Wokeism:
"Slobodian: Military Vaccine Mandate Breached Charter Rights" | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/slobodian-military-vaccine-mandate-breached-charter-rights/article_1170d33a-33c5-11ee-8cf0-678e71fd33c3.html;
